experience.description: Network engineer in CPD Principado de Asturias. 24x7 support and management routers Cisco and Teldat (2000+)

Application designer Ariba SAP Oracle. Mainly focus on automation, automation and automation. First contact with the DevOps culture as we know today. Sys admin and working with Jenkins, ElasticSearch, and Docker on Premise. Moreover, database administrator of Oracle and SQL.
DevOps engineer in multicloud environment of search e-commerce.
